Points2D.code:
class Points2D:
    def __init__(self,points=None,filepath=None):
        import os

        # Write points to temp file
        tmp_points_path = os.path.join(os.environ['PIPE_BASE'], "tmp_points.csv")
        content = "x,y\n"
        for p in points:
            line = ""
            for item in p:
                line += "%s," % str(item)
            line = line[:-1] + "\n"
            content += line
        f = open(tmp_points_path, "w")
        f.write(content)
        f.close()

        # Do the render
        command = "RScript %s %s %s" % (
            os.environ['PIPE_RENDER'] + "single_curve.R",
            tmp_points_path,
            filepath
        )
        os.system(command)

        # Clean up
        # os.remove(tmp_points_path)
        # plotter_excess_file = os.path.join(os.environ['PIPE_BASE'], "Rplots.pdf")
        # if os.path.isfile(plotter_excess_file): os.remove(plotter_excess_file)
